import React, {useState} from 'react' import Header from '../Header/Header' import Calendar from 'react-calendar' import 'react-calendar/dist/Calendar.css'; import Plus from './../Assets/plus.svg' import Minus from './../Assets/minus.svg' /** * @author * @function Lot_Management **/ const Lot_Management = (props) => { const [value, setValue] = useState(new Date()) const [hourlyIncrement, setHourlyIncrement] = useState({count: 0}) const [maxIncrement, setMaxIncrement] = useState({count: 0}) const max_inc = () =>{ setMaxIncrement({count: maxIncrement + 1}) } const hourly_inc = () =>{ setHourlyIncrement({count: hourlyIncrement + 1}) } const onchange_ = data =>{ setValue(data) console.log(data) console.log() } return(
